page.title: 13COMMUNITY POLICEMAN, FIRBECK
page.content: {In Letwell and Firbeck there is a {community policeman.}He goes around on a bike instead of a car because he can stop easily and talk and make friends with different people. He has been a{community policeman}for five years and a policeman for nine years.He feels his uniform is very important.It is dark blue trousers and a jacket with silver buttons down the front.His helmet is a navy blue.His main office is in{Firbeck.}He Leaves his bike at his office in{Firbeck}and he starts off in the morning from his office.If people want him they leave messages at {Firbeck. }He works 8 hour shifts usuaLLy from 8 in the morning till 4 in the afternoon. He has a black truncheon, a bike and stainLess steeL handcuffs.He takes part in stopping vandalism and theft. He cycles 7 to 8 miles a day.
